title: FITIAVANA NANAVOTRA

verses.1:
Tena harena lalina
Tsy takatry ny saina
Ny fitiavan' Andriamanitra
Nanavotr'ahy
verses.2:
Tsy miova, tsy misy ohatr'Azy
Tsy hay lazaina
Ny fitiavan'Andriamanitra
Nanavotr'ahy
verses.3:
Endrey tsara
Endrey mamy
Ny mihira ny
Zanak'Ondry nanavotr'ahy.

chorus:
Ho ahy tsy mendrika
Nefa nohasoaviny
Fitiavana nanavotra.
